FacilityName: City of Del City Pollution Control Plan

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
The City of Del City, Oklahoma operates a pollution control plant located in the northern portion of the City. The plant uses chlorine to treat the wastewater  the personnel at the facility regarding the chlorine system. However, if an accident occurred, the City of Del City Fire Department and the Local Emergency Planning Commission (LEPC) would be notified and would respond immediately. 

The City of Del City Pollution Control Plant has no current plans to c
hange the chlorine process in the foreseeable future.
